availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, judge and twelfth governor of Kentucky. Married to Susan Forsythe. Father of James Clark, Sarah Ann Clark, and Susan Clark. Served in the United States House of Representatives from 1813 to 1816, and again from 1825 to 1831. Elected to Kentucky state senate in 1832 and served as Speaker. Elected governor of Kentucky in 1836.

ab.bibl:
Appletons' Cyclopedia of American Biography, 1600-1889, Vol. 1 (New York: D. Appleton and Company, 1888), p. 628.
Find A Grave, "James Clark (1779-1839)," Memorial #19299462, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19299462 (accessed May 5, 2020).
